argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumclim.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumclim.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumclim.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumclim.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | isumclim.6 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> B ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_isum | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A = ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fclim | |- ~~> : dom ~~> --> CC |
| 8 |  | #P_ffun | |- ( ~~> : dom ~~> --> CC -> Fun ~~> ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- Fun ~~> |
| 10 |  | #P_funbrfv | |- ( Fun ~~> -> ( seq M ( + , F ) ~~> B -> ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) = B ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 5, 10 | #P_mpsyl | |- ( ph -> ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) = B ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A = B ) |
